title: DATABASE_STORAGE_USAGE_HISTORY View (Organization Usage): New Columns in View | Snowflake Documentation
paragraphs: This behavior change is in the 2023_04 bundle.
For the current status of the bundle, refer to Bundle History.

The  following columns were added as the last columns of the DATABASE_STORAGE_USAGE_HISTORY view in the ORGANIZATION_USAGE
schema:
Date and time when the database was dropped; NULL for active databases.
These columns already exist in the DATABASE_STORAGE_USAGE_HISTORY view in the ACCOUNT_USAGE schema.
